onBoardingContent1: Welcome to our world scroll forward to learn how to use.
onBoardingContent2: Share your thoughts and experiences completely anonymously without prejudice, interact with people.
onBoardingContent3: If you are a member before, you can log in or you can become a new member using just your username and password.
loginText: Sign in and continue where you left off.
invalidUserName: Your username must be greater than 6 digits
invalidPassword: Your password must be greater than 8 digits
haveAccount: Do you have an account? Login
registerSubtext: All you have to do is choose your username and password.
